Sentencas: 3D microstructures for nanostructured solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) electrodes fabricated by infiltration/impregnation method are constructed numerically, by using a phenomenological procedure.
Titulo: Geometric Properties of Nanostructured Solid Oxide Fuel Cell Electrodes

Sentencas: Key geometric properties of the constructed electrodes are calculated at various infiltration loadings, including the percolation probabilities of pores and infiltrated nanoparticles, the total and active three-phase boundary (TPB) length, backbone and nanoparticles surface areas, and backbone-nanoparticles boundary area.
Titulo: Geometric Properties of Nanostructured Solid Oxide Fuel Cell Electrodes

Sentencas: The effects of backbone particle size, backbone porosity, nanoparticle size, and its aggregation risk are studied systematically.
Titulo: Geometric Properties of Nanostructured Solid Oxide Fuel Cell Electrodes

Sentencas: Analytical models are developed to predict these geometric properties, and agree well with the numerical infiltration results, as well as the literature data.
Titulo: Geometric Properties of Nanostructured Solid Oxide Fuel Cell Electrodes

Sentencas: It is found that the peak TPB length can be achieved at 63% coverage of the backbone surface by infiltrated nanoparticles.
Titulo: Geometric Properties of Nanostructured Solid Oxide Fuel Cell Electrodes

Sentencas: More interestingly, the backbone structure has little effect on nanoparticles surface area, but significantly affects TPB length, suggesting an strategy to identify electrode reaction mechanisms.
Titulo: Geometric Properties of Nanostructured Solid Oxide Fuel Cell Electrodes

Sentencas: Decreasing infiltrated particle size increases its surface area, enhances the peak TPB length, and decreases the optimal infiltration loading, indicating small infiltrated particles essentially benefits electrode performance.
Titulo: Geometric Properties of Nanostructured Solid Oxide Fuel Cell Electrodes

Sentencas: The results provide valuable information for understanding the geometric properties of the infiltrated SOFC electrodes and contribute to the design of high performance SOFC electrodes.
Titulo: Geometric Properties of Nanostructured Solid Oxide Fuel Cell Electrodes
Geometric Properties of Nanostructured Solid Oxide Fuel Cell Electrodes
